name: dnb-hugo-libs
description: A collection of "bridges" to the tools that are being used in David's Neighbour's Hugo productions.

scripts.release: standard-version --release-as patch -a && git push --follow-tags origin main
scripts.release-next: standard-version --release-as minor -a && git push --follow-tags origin main
scripts.release-major: standard-version --release-as major -a && git push --follow-tags origin main

author: Patrick Kollitsch <patrick@davids-neighbour.com>
